channel.title: Stack Overflow problem with mobile miner and handslot
channel.description:
I apologize, my english is really bad.
Stackable mobile miners are a problem with Stack Overflow. If I pick up the stack in the hand slot and drop it on an ressource node, the entire stack becomes to one miner. Even after taking it up it's just one miner.
I hope I could describe the problem clearly
